page.title: 15Walker Ground
page.content: {Southgate Walker Ground:} These clubs are regular users of the Walker Ground. Southgate Cricket Club l855 Southgate Adelaide Cricket Club 1870 Southgate Hockey Club 1886 Southgate Adelaide Hockey Club 1926 The Weld Lawn Tennis Club 1924 Southgate Squash Rackets Club 1975 Oakwood Netball Club 1958 6th Southgate (Christ Church) Scout Group 1911 Jogging Club Getting in Shape Hockey and Netball Sep-March Cricket April-Sep Tennis and Squash all year. The huts in the field are used to store equipment and to maintain pitches. The field is 14 acres of land. It has been a sports club since 1855. It has 6 hockey pitches and 3 cricket squares.
